learningPaths.title: Learning Paths
learningPaths.subtitle: Structured learning journeys for different skill levels
learningPaths.description: Follow curated paths designed to take you from beginner to advanced frontend developer.
learningPaths.pathDescription: This path will guide you through the fundamentals of frontend development, starting with HTML and CSS basics, then moving to JavaScript fundamentals, and finally introducing you to modern frameworks.

recommendations.title: Recommended Next Steps
recommendations.basedOnProgress: Based on your progress, we recommend:

studyPlans.title: Study Plans
studyPlans.subtitle: Structured learning paths for your interview preparation
studyPlans.description: Choose a study plan that fits your schedule and goals. Each plan is designed to help you master frontend development systematically.

oneWeek.title: 1-Week Intensive Plan
oneWeek.subtitle: 2 hours daily • 14 hours total
oneWeek.description: Fast-track your preparation with intensive daily practice. Perfect for last-minute interview preparation.

oneMonth.title: 1-Month Balanced Plan
oneMonth.subtitle: 6 hours weekly • 24 hours total
oneMonth.description: Balanced approach with core concepts and practical exercises. Ideal for comprehensive preparation.

threeMonths.title: 3-Month Comprehensive Plan
threeMonths.subtitle: 3 hours weekly • 36 hours total
threeMonths.description: Comprehensive preparation with deep dives into advanced topics. Perfect for thorough mastery.

preparationGuides.title: Interview Preparation Guides
preparationGuides.subtitle: Strategic resources to ace your frontend interviews
preparationGuides.description: Comprehensive guides and strategies developed by experienced interviewers and industry experts.

frontendPlaybook.title: Frontend Interview Playbook
frontendPlaybook.description: Complete guide to frontend interview preparation with proven strategies and techniques.

gfe75.title: GFE75 - Essential Questions
gfe75.description: Curated list of 75 most important frontend questions that appear frequently in interviews.

blind75.title: Blind75 for Frontend
blind75.description: Adaptation of Blind75 algorithm questions for frontend development and system design.

systemDesignPlaybook.title: Frontend System Design Playbook
systemDesignPlaybook.description: Comprehensive guide to frontend system design with architecture patterns and best practices.

questionBank.title: Practice Question Bank
questionBank.subtitle: 500+ curated questions from top tech companies
questionBank.description: Comprehensive collection of frontend interview questions with detailed solutions and explanations.
